item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 25, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Bitwarden SDK relicensed from proprietary to GPLv3 (585 points | 218 comments)
2. Show HN: I made a Bluesky video downloader that can download videos from Bluesky (13 points | 4 comments)
3. Quantized Llama models with increased speed and a reduced memory footprint (400 points | 96 comments)
4. Inserting a 0 bit in the middle of a value (17 points | 9 comments)
5. Smarter Than 'Ctrl+F': Linking Directly to Web Page Content (27 points | 18 comments)
6. OpenFeature – a vendor-agnostic, community-driven API for feature flagging (106 points | 27 comments)
7. Launch HN: Skyvern (YC S23) – open-source AI agent for browser automations (289 points | 62 comments)
8. Yes, we did discover the Higgs (67 points | 20 comments)
9. Why Safety Profiles Failed (179 points | 112 comments)
10. Security research on Private Cloud Compute (250 points | 88 comments)
11. Law Enforcement Undermines Tor (9 points | discuss)
12. Never Missing the Train Again (273 points | 102 comments)
13. Brush – A new compatible Gaussian splatting engine (140 points | 40 comments)
14. Post World War II Food (216 points | 185 comments)
15. Zigler: Zig NIFs in Elixir (194 points | 63 comments)
16. Quit Social Media (2016) (112 points | 98 comments)
17. ST Book, the Notebook Atari ST (67 points | 33 comments)
18. Vapi (YC W21) is hiring a founding infra engineer to handle scale ( | hide)
19. Writer Underwriting Writer (17 points | 2 comments)
20. Lingo: A Go micro language framework for building Domain Specific Languages (94 points | 33 comments)
21. Calculating the norm of a complex number (50 points | 28 comments)
22. The brain's waste clearing lymphatic system shown in people for first time (118 points | 29 comments)
23. The Lion of St. Mark's Square in Venice Is Chinese (155 points | 52 comments)
24. TLA from First Principles (43 points | 7 comments)
25. Show HN: TypeSchema – A JSON specification to describe data models (93 points | 39 comments)
26. Show HN: RF Hunter – Find hidden cameras and other devices (479 points | 146 comments)
27. Species in Pieces (60 points | 6 comments)
28. Show HN: Rust based AWS Lambda Logs Viewer (TUI) (40 points | 9 comments)
29. Riot Games: Peeking into Valorant's Netcode (2020) (153 points | 66 comments)
30. When Samsung meets MediaTek: the story of a small bug chain [pdf] (41 points | 4 comments)
